channel.title: Name Display
channel.description:
Dear moparscapers,
I'm trying to figure out how to add item requirements for display an objects name. Like if you have a rune scimitar in your inventory the object will have an option for example: Enter. Is it possible to do this? I'm using bluurr's client. Hope someone can help me.
Thanks in advance, halflive9

item.title: Name Display
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

Replace the object via the server.

E.G. The rune altars.

Read full topic
